scripts.test: npm run build && playwright test -gv docker
scripts.type: tsc --build src/tsconfig.json && tsc -p slug/shell/tsconfig.json && tsc -p slug/debugger/tsconfig.json && tsc -p slug/editor/tsconfig.json
scripts.release: npm run check && node utils/publish-sdk.js && node utils/bundle-and-upload-slugs.js && node utils/package-and-upload.js
scripts.check: npm run type && npm run build && playwright test --forbid-only --workers 1
